response.overview: Emmett Freedy forgot to do his science project and through a twist of weird fate gets sent home thus avoiding having to present his project. While at home with his pet fish Mr. Carpatheos, things take a super odd turn. A pilot done for Nickelodeon. This was shown at the Annecy International Animation Film Festival  and at Hiroshima International Animation Festival. Tom Megalis writer, director and animator.
response.title: Emmett
